ygData.subject: Re: Need help on hunting places
ygData.msgSnippet: The best place that I have found for soloing at level 12 is West and North Karanas.  Pincer Beetles should be possible for you at level 12.  But, if you can
ygData.messageBody:
The best place that I have found for soloing at level 12 is West and North
Karanas. Pincer Beetles should be possible for you at level 12. But, if you
can team up with one good tank and one cleric, you can easily make North
Karanas your home for levels 11 through 14. Excellent for exp, but lousy for
loot. BTW, the beetles are much less trouble for the experience than Griffawns
(baby griffs).


> Hello I am at lvl 12 Wood elf bard. it seems that I cannot find a good
> place for me to solo. I went to CB but the orc's hit so hard that it keeps
> disrupting my song. I died 5 times in there. I went to Nro and all the
> places has been camp out. I was wondering if anyone know a good place to
> solo at lvl 12.
>
> Thanx,
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard,
> Hammerpaw and Samiam
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
